trans-unit.source: Paints an area with a linear gradient.
A <xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush> paints an area with a linear gradient.
trans-unit.target: Un <xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush> pinta un área con un degradado lineal.

trans-unit.source: A linear gradient defines a gradient along a line.
trans-unit.target: Un degradado lineal define un degradado a lo largo de una línea.

trans-unit.source: The line's end points are defined by the <xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush.StartPoint%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush.EndPoint%2A> properties of the linear gradient.
trans-unit.target: Dos puntos finales de la línea se definen mediante la <xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush.StartPoint%2A> y <xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush.EndPoint%2A> propiedades del degradado lineal.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush> brush paints its <xref:System.Windows.Media.GradientBrush.GradientStops%2A> along this line.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush> pincel pinta su <xref:System.Windows.Media.GradientBrush.GradientStops%2A> a lo largo de esta línea.

trans-unit.source: The default linear gradient is diagonal.
trans-unit.target: El degradado lineal predeterminado es diagonal.

trans-unit.source: In the default, the <xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush.StartPoint%2A> of a linear gradient is (0,0), the upper-left corner of the area being painted, and its <xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush.EndPoint%2A> is (1,1), the lower-right corner of the area being painted.
trans-unit.target: De manera predeterminada, el <xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush.StartPoint%2A> de un degradado lineal es (0,0), la esquina superior izquierda del área que se va a pintar y su <xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush.EndPoint%2A> es (1,1), la esquina inferior derecha del área que se está pintando.

trans-unit.source: The colors in the resulting gradient are interpolated along the diagonal path.
trans-unit.target: Los colores de degradado resultante se interpolan a lo largo de la ruta de acceso diagonal.

trans-unit.source: The following illustration shows a diagonal gradient.
trans-unit.target: En la siguiente ilustración muestra un degradado diagonal.

trans-unit.source: A line was added to highlight the interpolation path of the gradient from the start point to the end point.
trans-unit.target: Se agregó una línea para resaltar el trazado de interpolación del degradado desde el punto inicial hasta el punto final.

trans-unit.source: ![Gradient axis for a diagonal linear gradient](~/add/media/wcpsdk-graphicsmm-diagonalgradientaxis.png "Gradient axis for a diagonal linear gradient")
trans-unit.target: ![Eje de degradado para un degradado lineal diagonal](~/add/media/wcpsdk-graphicsmm-diagonalgradientaxis.png "eje de degradado para un degradado lineal diagonal")

trans-unit.source: A diagonal linear gradient
trans-unit.target: Degradado lineal diagonal

trans-unit.source: The next illustration shows the same linear gradient, but with highlighted gradient stops.
trans-unit.target: La ilustración siguiente muestra el mismo degradado lineal, pero con delimitadores de degradado resaltadas.

trans-unit.source: ![Gradient stops in a linear gradient](~/add/media/wcpsdk-graphicsmm-4gradientstops.png "Gradient stops in a linear gradient")
trans-unit.target: ![Delimitadores de degradado en un degradado lineal](~/add/media/wcpsdk-graphicsmm-4gradientstops.png "delimitadores de degradado en un degradado lineal")

trans-unit.source: A diagonal linear gradient with highlighted gradient stops
trans-unit.target: Degradado lineal diagonal con delimitadores de degradado resaltadas

trans-unit.source: It is possible to specify a gradient axis that does not completely fill area being painted.
trans-unit.target: Es posible especificar un eje de degradado que no rellene íntegramente el área que se está pintando.

trans-unit.source: When this occurs, the <xref:System.Windows.Media.GradientBrush.SpreadMethod%2A> property determines how the remaining area is painted.
trans-unit.target: Cuando esto ocurre, el <xref:System.Windows.Media.GradientBrush.SpreadMethod%2A> propiedad determina cómo se pinta el área restante.

trans-unit.source: Freezable Features
trans-unit.target: Características de los objetos Freezable

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush> is a type of <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object and therefore can be frozen to improve performance.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush> es un tipo de <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> de objeto y por lo tanto, se puede inmovilizar para mejorar el rendimiento.

trans-unit.source: For information about <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> features, such as freezing and cloning, see [Freezable Objects Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/freezable-objects-overview.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obtener información acerca de <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> características, como la inmovilización y la clonación, consulte [Freezable Objects Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/freezable-objects-overview.md).

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush" /> class.
The <xref:System.Windows.Media.GradientBrush.MappingMode%2A> of the brush is initialized to <xref:System.Windows.Media.BrushMappingMode.RelativeToBoundingBox>.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Windows.Media.GradientBrush.MappingMode%2A> del pincel se inicializa en <xref:System.Windows.Media.BrushMappingMode.RelativeToBoundingBox>.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush" /> class.
The <xref:System.Windows.Media.GradientBrush.MappingMode%2A> of the brush is initialized to <xref:System.Windows.Media.BrushMappingMode.RelativeToBoundingBox>.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Windows.Media.GradientBrush.MappingMode%2A> del pincel se inicializa en <xref:System.Windows.Media.BrushMappingMode.RelativeToBoundingBox>.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.GradientBrush.GradientStops" /> to set on this brush.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush" /> class that has the specified gradient stops.
The <xref:System.Windows.Media.GradientBrush.MappingMode%2A> of the brush is initialized to <xref:System.Windows.Media.BrushMappingMode.RelativeToBoundingBox>.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Windows.Media.GradientBrush.MappingMode%2A> del pincel se inicializa en <xref:System.Windows.Media.BrushMappingMode.RelativeToBoundingBox>.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.GradientBrush.GradientStops" /> to set on this brush.
A <see cref="T:System.Double" /> that represents the angle, in degrees, of the gradient.
A value of 0.0 creates a horizontal gradient, and a value of 90.0 creates a vertical gradient.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush" /> class that has the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GradientStopCollection" /> and angle.
The <xref:System.Windows.Media.GradientBrush.MappingMode%2A> of the brush is initialized to <xref:System.Windows.Media.BrushMappingMode.RelativeToBoundingBox>.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Windows.Media.GradientBrush.MappingMode%2A> del pincel se inicializa en <xref:System.Windows.Media.BrushMappingMode.RelativeToBoundingBox>.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Color" /> at offset 0.0.
The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Color" /> at offset 1.0.
A <see cref="T:System.Double" /> that represents the angle, in degrees, of the gradient.
A value of 0.0 creates a horizontal gradient, and a value of 90.0 creates a vertical gradient.

Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush" /> class that has the specified start <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Color" />, end <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Color" />, and angle.
The <xref:System.Windows.Media.GradientBrush.MappingMode%2A> of the brush is initialized to <xref:System.Windows.Media.BrushMappingMode.RelativeToBoundingBox>.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Windows.Media.GradientBrush.MappingMode%2A> del pincel se inicializa en <xref:System.Windows.Media.BrushMappingMode.RelativeToBoundingBox>.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.GradientBrush.GradientStops" /> to set on this brush.
The <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush.StartPoint" /> of the gradient.
The <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush.EndPoint" /> of the gradient.

Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush" /> class that has the specified gradient stops, <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush.StartPoint" />, and <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush.EndPoint" />.
The <xref:System.Windows.Media.GradientBrush.MappingMode%2A> of the brush is initialized to <xref:System.Windows.Media.BrushMappingMode.RelativeToBoundingBox>.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Windows.Media.GradientBrush.MappingMode%2A> del pincel se inicializa en <xref:System.Windows.Media.BrushMappingMode.RelativeToBoundingBox>.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Color" /> at offset 0.0.
The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Color" /> at offset 1.0.
The <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush.StartPoint" /> of the gradient.
The <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush.EndPoint" /> of the gradient.

Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush" /> class that has the specified start <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Color" />, end <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Color" />, <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush.StartPoint" />, and <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush.EndPoint" />.
The <xref:System.Windows.Media.GradientBrush.MappingMode%2A> of the brush is initialized to <xref:System.Windows.Media.BrushMappingMode.RelativeToBoundingBox>.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Windows.Media.GradientBrush.MappingMode%2A> del pincel se inicializa en <xref:System.Windows.Media.BrushMappingMode.RelativeToBoundingBox>.

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush" />, making deep copies of this object's values.
When copying dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (but they might no longer resolve) but not animations or their current values.
A modifiable clone of the current object.

The cloned object's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property will be <see langword="false" /> even if the source's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property was <see langword="true." />
This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: Este método se usa para generar copias modificables de inmovilizado <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objetos (o cualquier <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objeto).

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: Para mayor comodidad, este método prevalece sobre la versión heredada mediante una implementación fuertemente tipada.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: Para obtener más información, consulta <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush" /> object, making deep copies of this object's current values.
Resource references, data bindings, and animations are not copied, but their current values are.
A modifiable clone of the current object.

The cloned object's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property will be <see langword="false" /> even if the source's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property was <see langword="true" />.
This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: Este método se usa para generar copias modificables de inmovilizado <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objetos (o cualquier <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objeto).

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: Para mayor comodidad, este método prevalece sobre la versión heredada mediante una implementación fuertemente tipada.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: Para obtener más información, consulta <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the ending two-dimensional coordinates of the linear gradient.
The ending two-dimensional coordinates of the linear gradient.
trans-unit.target: Coordenadas bidimensionales finales del degradado lineal.

trans-unit.source: The default is (1,1).
trans-unit.target: El valor predeterminado es (1,1).

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush> paints a gradient along a line.
trans-unit.target: Un <xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush> pinta un degradado a lo largo de una línea.

trans-unit.source: The line's start and end points are defined by the <xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush.StartPoint%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush.EndPoint%2A> properties of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush>.
trans-unit.target: La línea puntos inicial y final se definen mediante la <xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush.StartPoint%2A> y <xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush.EndPoint%2A> propiedades de la <xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush>.

trans-unit.source: The default linear gradient is diagonal.
trans-unit.target: El degradado lineal predeterminado es diagonal.

trans-unit.source: In the default, the <xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush.StartPoint%2A> of a linear gradient is (0,0), the upper-left corner of the area being filled, and its <xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush.EndPoint%2A> is (1,1), the lower-right corner of the area being filled.
trans-unit.target: De manera predeterminada, el <xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush.StartPoint%2A> de un degradado lineal es (0,0), la esquina superior izquierda del área que se estaba llenando y su <xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush.EndPoint%2A> es (1,1), la esquina inferior derecha del área que se va a rellenar.

trans-unit.source: The colors in the resulting gradient are interpolated along the diagonal path.
trans-unit.target: Los colores de degradado resultante se interpolan a lo largo de la ruta de acceso diagonal.

trans-unit.source: The following image shows a diagonal gradient.
trans-unit.target: La siguiente imagen muestra un degradado diagonal.

trans-unit.source: The black line was added to highlight the interpolation path of the gradient from the start point to the end point.
trans-unit.target: Se agregó la línea negra para resaltar el trazado de interpolación del degradado desde el punto inicial hasta el punto final.

trans-unit.source: ![Gradient axis for a diagonal linear gradient](~/add/media/wcpsdk-graphicsmm-diagonalgradientaxis.png "Gradient axis for a diagonal linear gradient")
trans-unit.target: ![Eje de degradado para un degradado lineal diagonal](~/add/media/wcpsdk-graphicsmm-diagonalgradientaxis.png "eje de degradado para un degradado lineal diagonal")

trans-unit.source: A diagonal linear gradient
trans-unit.target: Degradado lineal diagonal

trans-unit.source: Specifying Relative or Absolute Values
trans-unit.target: Si se especifica Relative o valores absolutos

trans-unit.source: Note that the <xref:System.Windows.Media.GradientBrush.MappingMode%2A> property of a <xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush> determines whether its <xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush.EndPoint%2A> is interpreted as a relative or absolute value.
trans-unit.target: Tenga en cuenta que la <xref:System.Windows.Media.GradientBrush.MappingMode%2A> propiedad de un <xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush> determina si su <xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush.EndPoint%2A> se interpreta como un valor relativo o absoluto.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Media.GradientBrush.MappingMode%2A> of <xref:System.Windows.Media.BrushMappingMode.RelativeToBoundingBox> specifies that the <xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush.EndPoint%2A> value is relative to the size of the painted area.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Windows.Media.GradientBrush.MappingMode%2A> de <xref:System.Windows.Media.BrushMappingMode.RelativeToBoundingBox> especifica que el <xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush.EndPoint%2A> valor es relativo al tamaño del área de pintura.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Media.GradientBrush.MappingMode%2A> of <xref:System.Windows.Media.BrushMappingMode.Absolute> specifies that the <xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush.EndPoint%2A> value is expressed in device independent pixels.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Windows.Media.GradientBrush.MappingMode%2A> de <xref:System.Windows.Media.BrushMappingMode.Absolute> especifica que el <xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush.EndPoint%2A> valor se expresa en píxeles independientes del dispositivo.

trans-unit.source: By default, the <xref:System.Windows.Media.GradientBrush.MappingMode%2A> is set to <xref:System.Windows.Media.BrushMappingMode.RelativeToBoundingBox>, making the <xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush.EndPoint%2A> a relative value.
trans-unit.target: De forma predeterminada, el <xref:System.Windows.Media.GradientBrush.MappingMode%2A> está establecido en <xref:System.Windows.Media.BrushMappingMode.RelativeToBoundingBox>, lo que permite el <xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush.EndPoint%2A> valor relativo.

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
trans-unit.target: Información sobre propiedades de dependencia

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: Campo identificador

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to `true`
trans-unit.target: Propiedades de metadatos establecidos en `true`

trans-unit.source: None
trans-unit.target: Ninguna

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush.EndPoint" /> dependency property.
Gets or sets the starting two-dimensional coordinates of the linear gradient.
The starting two-dimensional coordinates for the linear gradient.
trans-unit.target: Coordenadas bidimensionales iniciales del degradado lineal.

trans-unit.source: The default is (0, 0).
trans-unit.target: El valor predeterminado es (0, 0).

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush> paints a gradient along a line.
trans-unit.target: Un <xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush> pinta un degradado a lo largo de una línea.

trans-unit.source: The line's start and end points are defined by the <xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush.StartPoint%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush.EndPoint%2A> properties of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush>.
trans-unit.target: La línea puntos inicial y final se definen mediante la <xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush.StartPoint%2A> y <xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush.EndPoint%2A> propiedades de la <xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush>.

trans-unit.source: The default linear gradient is diagonal.
trans-unit.target: El degradado lineal predeterminado es diagonal.

trans-unit.source: In the default, the <xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush.StartPoint%2A> of a linear gradient is (0,0), the upper-left corner of the area being filled, and its <xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush.EndPoint%2A> is (1,1), the lower-right corner of the area being filled.
trans-unit.target: De manera predeterminada, el <xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush.StartPoint%2A> de un degradado lineal es (0,0), la esquina superior izquierda del área que se estaba llenando y su <xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush.EndPoint%2A> es (1,1), la esquina inferior derecha del área que se va a rellenar.

trans-unit.source: The colors in the resulting gradient are interpolated along the diagonal path.
trans-unit.target: Los colores de degradado resultante se interpolan a lo largo de la ruta de acceso diagonal.

trans-unit.source: The following image shows a diagonal gradient.
trans-unit.target: La siguiente imagen muestra un degradado diagonal.

trans-unit.source: The black line was added to highlight the interpolation path of the gradient from the start point to the end point.
trans-unit.target: Se agregó la línea negra para resaltar el trazado de interpolación del degradado desde el punto inicial hasta el punto final.

trans-unit.source: ![Gradient axis for a diagonal linear gradient](~/add/media/wcpsdk-graphicsmm-diagonalgradientaxis.png "Gradient axis for a diagonal linear gradient")
trans-unit.target: ![Eje de degradado para un degradado lineal diagonal](~/add/media/wcpsdk-graphicsmm-diagonalgradientaxis.png "eje de degradado para un degradado lineal diagonal")

trans-unit.source: A diagonal linear gradient
trans-unit.target: Degradado lineal diagonal

trans-unit.source: Specifying Relative or Absolute Values
trans-unit.target: Si se especifica Relative o valores absolutos

trans-unit.source: Note that the <xref:System.Windows.Media.GradientBrush.MappingMode%2A> property of a <xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush> determines whether its <xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush.StartPoint%2A> is interpreted as a relative or absolute value.
trans-unit.target: Tenga en cuenta que la <xref:System.Windows.Media.GradientBrush.MappingMode%2A> propiedad de un <xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush> determina si su <xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush.StartPoint%2A> se interpreta como un valor relativo o absoluto.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Media.GradientBrush.MappingMode%2A> of <xref:System.Windows.Media.BrushMappingMode.RelativeToBoundingBox> specifies that the <xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush.EndPoint%2A> value is relative to the size of the painted area.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Windows.Media.GradientBrush.MappingMode%2A> de <xref:System.Windows.Media.BrushMappingMode.RelativeToBoundingBox> especifica que el <xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush.EndPoint%2A> valor es relativo al tamaño del área de pintura.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Media.GradientBrush.MappingMode%2A> of <xref:System.Windows.Media.BrushMappingMode.Absolute> specifies that the <xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush.StartPoint%2A> value is expressed in device independent pixels.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Windows.Media.GradientBrush.MappingMode%2A> de <xref:System.Windows.Media.BrushMappingMode.Absolute> especifica que el <xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush.StartPoint%2A> valor se expresa en píxeles independientes del dispositivo.

trans-unit.source: By default, the <xref:System.Windows.Media.GradientBrush.MappingMode%2A> is set to <xref:System.Windows.Media.BrushMappingMode.RelativeToBoundingBox>, making the <xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush.StartPoint%2A> a relative value.
trans-unit.target: De forma predeterminada, el <xref:System.Windows.Media.GradientBrush.MappingMode%2A> está establecido en <xref:System.Windows.Media.BrushMappingMode.RelativeToBoundingBox>, lo que permite el <xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush.StartPoint%2A> valor relativo.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush.StartPoint" /> dependency property.
